title: The Naked Gun 2Â½: The Smell of Fear

sources.title: 1950 - The Gun - for a woman like this ... a man would do anything ... even murder!
sources.description:
A veteran homicide detective, Lt. Ed Cullen (Lee J. Cobb), who has witnessed his socialite girlfriend Lois Frazer (Jane Wyatt) kill her husband Howard Frazer (Harlan Warde), sees his newly-minted detective brother Andy Cullen (John Dall) assigned to the case alongside him.

Original Title: The Man Who Cheated Himself (1950)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/dPfaIzYXna0


Director: Felix E. Feist
Writers: Seton I. Miller, Philip MacDonald
Main cast: Lee J. Cobb, Jane Wyatt, John Dall

Genres: Crime, Drama, Film-Noir, Mystery
Release date: December 26, 1950
Budget: $500,000
Filming location: San Francisco

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Lieutenant Frank Drebbin returns to save the day once again. This time he's out to foil the "big boys" in the energy business. A top scientist (Dr. Mainheimer) is about to publish his report on energy supply for the future. Things don't look good for the traditional suppliers; oil, coal, and nuclear. To save their industries, the suppliers kidnap Mainheimer and replace him with a decoy with a more favorable report. Jane, the doctor's secretary, is Drebin's old flame. Their passionate love affair is thus rekindled.
metadata.Writer: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker
metadata.Actors: Leslie Nielsen, Priscilla Presley, George Kennedy
